name: Shrimp and Quinoa
author: BLUESP
summary: This delicious shrimp, quinoa, and vegetable recipe can be eaten hot as a main dish or cold as a salad.
ingredients: 6  fresh asparagus spears, trimmed and chopped
1 pound medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
½ cup chopped Italian flat leaf parsley
directions: In a large pot, bring the water to a boil, and stir in the quinoa
Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 15 minutes
Remove from heat, and set aside 10 minutes, or until all liquid has been absorbed
Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium heat, and saute the onion and green bell pepper until tender
Mix in the mushrooms, asparagus, raisins, and ginger, and continue cooking until asparagus is tender
Mix in the shrimp, and cook 5 minutes, or until opaque
In a large bowl, mix the quinoa with the lime juice and remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil
Toss with the skillet mixture and parsley to serve
